summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Weller Street from 12th Avenue South to 20th Avenue South in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer, under Ordinance No. 12836, creating Local Improvement District No. 1130 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
